COORIDOR.name: COORIDOR
COORIDOR.desc: This is the Cooridor in the Nerd's Work Space. This is the place where you normally work.

items.desc: A cell phone is lying on a table. It is your phone.
items.take: You pick the cell phone off of the table. When you put the cell phone in your pocket it gets a notification.

MUSIC ROOM.name: MUSIC ROOM
MUSIC ROOM.desc: This is the magic happens to make the music for the videogames.

items.desc: It is sheet music for one of your first games.
items.take: You put the sheet music in your backpack for inspiration for when you get to your Study.

ART ROOM.name: ART ROOM
ART ROOM.desc: It is a room that has all kinds of arts materials. This room is where the graphic for game come to life.

items.desc: A normal brush that looks to have been used
items.take: You put the brush in your backpack.

ART GALLERY.name: ART GALLERY
ART GALLERY.desc: This room shows off the best projects that your work has made.

MAIN HALL.name: MAIN HALL
MAIN HALL.desc: This room connects to several hangout rooms.

NERD'S CORNER.name: NERD'S CORNER
NERD'S CORNER.desc: This is a very nerdy space. Several anime posters hang on the wall. You even notice the Harry Potter poster. On the table there is a paper wait that looks like the Starship Enterprise.

items.desc: There are so many dice in a varity of colors.
items.take: You put the D&D dice in your bag nobody will miss them and this is what everybody does.

GAME ROOM.name: GAME ROOM
GAME ROOM.desc: There are so many systems and games that have been collected over the years. There is also a gaming PC.

items.desc: On of your favorite systems to play.
items.take: You put the system in you backpack.

items.desc: A stack of your favorite games.
items.take: You put the games in your bag.
You put your charger in you backpack.
You put your laptop in your bag.

items.desc: The thing you use to charge your laptop.
items.take: You put the charger in your bag.

KITCHEN.name: KITCHEN
KITCHEN.desc: This is where you get the gaming food.

items.desc: The food of the gaming Gods.
items.take: You grab a bowl of Ramen.

items.desc: The nector of the gaming Gods.

STUDY.name: STUDY
STUDY.desc: This is where you get the coding done.
